response.original_title: Slowenien – Reisen im Land der Sagen und Mythen
response.overview: Slovenia is the land of a thousand faces. The most beautiful landscapes that couldn't be more different can be found in the smallest of spaces: The high mountain peaks of the Julian Alps with gorges and river valleys, fascinating caves and Karst areas, cheerful wine villages and picturesque coastal towns, such as the Venetian-style Piran.
response.title: Slovenia - Traveling in the land of legends and myths

release_dates.note: Exact date unknown, was produced in 2017
